term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - bonded phase in chromatography
term.title: bonded phase

item.text: A stationary phase which is covalently bonded to the support particles or to the inside wall of the column tubing.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 823 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
